A4.text: She works as a geneticist and is an expert in mutant affairs.

A5.text: She was a mutant all along, with a rare power that let her redo her life every time she died.

A6.text: MacTaggart operates a genetic research facility on Muir Island.

A7.text: Moira MacTaggart is a non-mutant supporting character.
